refnamediv.refpurpose: Select type of float for sidebar elements

refsection.para: Selects the type of float for sidebar elements.

listitem.para: If sidebar.float.type is none, then no float is used.
If sidebar.float.type is before, then the float appears at the top of the page. On some processors, that may be the next page rather than the current page.
If sidebar.float.type is left, then a left side float is used.
If sidebar.float.type is start, then when the text direction is left-to-right a left side float is used. When the text direction is right-to-left, a right side float is used.
If sidebar.float.type is right, then a right side float is used.
If sidebar.float.type is end, then when the text direction is left-to-right a right side float is used. When the text direction is right-to-left, a left side float is used.
If your XSL-FO processor supports floats positioned on the inside or outside of double-sided pages, then you have those two options for side floats as well.
